I took the exam twice, first exam I failed by like 5 questions... And it was similar to the one I took today, although I will strongly recommend to take the official ptce practice test, and continue studying out of the Mosby book. And I'm certain you'll do great!! Gl pal

Lmao I actually got that question! And along with like 3 or 4 others asking questions asking what a certain pharmacy law did. Also study what certain associations to like the fda, Dea, and tjc. I had like 5 questions on my exam about those. If you have more questions dont be shy to ask lol
I passed ! The math was the easiest part (and that's coming from someone who's math isn't their forte). I had about 3 generic to brand questions. So don't spend too much time studying your drugs.

WRITING.TITLE: Don't give up!
WRITING.TEXT: This is post is written for the fellow pharmacy techs who are not yet certified and are looking for words of encouragement/advice. Personally passing the PTCE was a challenge for me. The first time I took the exam I was overwhelmed with exam anxiety fearing that I would fail the exam. I let the anxiety of the exam get in they way and I failed the exam by a couple of points. I felt lost and confused and felt severely depressed about my result. At one point I even thought of calling it quits and pursue something else in life. But being a pharmacy tech made me generally happy(except when angry customers are screaming at me lol) . So this time I decided to study more efficiently, I took the subreddit's advice and bought the Mosby book aswell as taking the official practice test online and passed the exam! Despite me wanting to give up multiple times I stuck to it and passed the exam. Tl;dr: this sub reddit does an amazing job at providing resources to pass the exam and don't quit! cus I'm pretty sure momma didn't raise a quitter.

I just took the exam like 5 minutes ago! And from the exam I took there where around 5 apothecary exam questions. I think if you take the practice test it will help you see how the actual exam is going to be like.

WRITING.TITLE: How 2 not feel like a fuck up
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey r/selfimprovemnt! I know this is a difficult and rooted issue I have but I need to starting turning my life around and I'm hoping i can start here with this post. All my life I have struggled with my insecurities and the lack of confidence which has resulted in me to get no where in life, which in turn makes me feel like a constant failure. currently a 19m who only has about 5 friends. I also go to community college and already have 4 W's under my name(I dropped a semester due to a break up with my girlfriend) . Im constantly broke despite having a job since the age of 18. I also just got unemployed for failing to pass my ptcb which is my pharmacy tech test. And to finally add the icing to the cake my ex girlfriend who used to be the only sun shine in my life is living the time of her life attending one of the best schools In the states. I also hate the fact that she's the only girl I hangout with.! Even though I enjoy her company it makes me feel like a pathetic loser when I hangout with her due to the fact that she is makes friends constantly at school( while getting hit on a dating other people), she also has a nice job, and is acing school.
How do I turn my life around I'm tired feeling like a loser and letting people down. I struggle with depression... but sometimes I feel like that's an excuse now.
Have crown foil, want 80 keys fast men! Lowballs =down vote Edit: don't really have crown foils.. Just for da memes
Yeah, I feel like I'm liked there. He said he was going to put me on loa until I pass the test.
Yeah, I was confused. They sent me a license renewal over the mail BUT it for techs that where already licensed! Therefore I can't renew my trainee license. Have to pass the test

Yeah, I surprised them with a visit today. Pharmacist told me that I could extend trainee license!Apperantly there someone in our district who has been a trainee for years! So I'll just leave this up in case some one has the same situation
Also live in Texas, currently a tech in training. Making 10.12. I work for cvs inside of a target.. The Starbucks baristas inside the Starbucks make 10.50! I like my job tho

WRITING.TITLE: Will I get fired?
WRITING.TEXT: So I live in Texas, and I am currently working on obtaining my pharmacy tech license. My trainee license will expire at August 31. I have signed up to take my ptcb exam on September 7 which is the soonest opened schedule date. My question is if there is anyway to extend my trainee license? I know in Texas there is a renewal for a trainee license, but from what I understand is that you can only obtain that when it is expired... Will I get terminated from my job if it does expire? Also I know I shouldn't have waited last minute to sign of up the exam but I was 17 when I signed of the trainee license and was going through depression/suicide attempt atm, and didn't step a foot into the pharmacy until 5 months ago.

WRITING.TITLE: Should I say happy birthday?
WRITING.TEXT: Have you guys ever felt for a short period of time that your depression was gone for good? Well sometimes I get that feeling. And for that split second in my life I can really smile and put an end to all my problems. Today is one of my best friends birthday, I basically grew up with him we knew each other since elementary. I shouldn't say happy birthday to him. I haven't talked to him in months. When I was diagnosed with depression and had my suicide attempt he left out of my life ( or so I thought ) he saw my suicide attempt as a form of a mid life crises ( I was 18 at that time) and the only real support I had in my life was my ex girlfriend. I really loved my ex girlfriend a lot she was the only person who would make me feel like there was something to live for. We where together for almost 3 years and that was something really rare to be seen as a teenager. We really did love each other but my depression made me feel like a burden to her life. Scared of her falling out of love with me as well as breaking up with me, and feeling like a burden to her life I decided to break up with her. While we were broken up we would still hangout kiss and do boyfriend and girlfriend type of stuff. She would mention that my bestfriend would constantly message her. And after a few months passed by she told me he asked her out and she rejected him. Then after that I started to notice that my bestfriend would start to message me only when me and my ex and i would hang out. I found out that he would say stuff like "I really feel bad for him and I really wish I could help him with his depression " to her, and she would say that's so sweet of him...I started to feel like he was just using my depression to get closer to her. I never thought it would have worked or that he would go that low to use my depression as a tool to get closer to her. After a few months passed I felt like my depression was going away and that me and my ex and I could be together and start a normal life. She rejected me, I was really destroyed but I began to move on. I started seeing another girl( who has a boyfriend ) and it made my ex girlfriend really jealous. My ex started giving me more attention but when she found out that I had sex with the other girl she cut me off from her life for about a month . As clich as it sounds I really liked my ex girlfriend, not just as a lover but a bestfriend, after all she was the only person who was supportive when I had my suicide attempt. We arranged to hangout before Christmas and that's when I find out that my ex girlfriend and my bestfriend had been kissing and going on dates. When I found out that they kissed my body turned pale and cold. I felt so betrayed on both sides. Why him? He used me to get closer to you? Do you know how much of an ass he's been to me? All these questions would spiral out of my head. I felt like I stabbed in the back while I was already on the ground because of this stupid depression. Out of desperation I tried so hard to win over my ex, it made me look so weak and desperate, but I really didn't want to lose her. I would cry for nights, then to add insult to injury my bestfriend would send me messages like "she was never truly happy with you... Ect" . I didn't realize that by trying to get her back I would appeare as desperate, as well as needy... And soon the pieces of the puzzles began to click. She didn't have feelings for me anymore and the final piece of the puzzle was found when she chose him to be her Valentines . I decided to move on with my life after that, it's been hell. I feel like I will never be able to date again. I don't have a close friend anymore. I hardly text people or go out , I dropped out of all my classes this semester in college because I just feel like an emotional wreck, but today is my bestfriends birthday. The scum who I needed support from when I was at my weakest. The scum who was my bestfriend for 10 years.... the scum who I wish I was still bestfriends with. The scum who used my depression to get closer to my ex. I just don't know if I can text him happy birthday... It hurts too much...
It was more of a personal question sorry for not specifing , I just wanted to see what forever alone means to you personallly.

Ok, honestly being attractive does not make things better. I have been told many times that I'm attractive, but I'm still here in the same situation az you are. I have issues with depression that have caused me to be FA. Being attractive won't make you find true love. Being attractive will not cure all your solution. Just remember that all these issues are just in your head. Rip Karma

Umm well I think when my therapist diagnosed me with clinical depression I was clinically depressed. As for the the bleach, it burned my throat for a weak. The thing was that I was throwing up uncontrollably... I still had to go to the emergency room... It was class crazy experience because I just turned 18 when it happened and like they took me to a mental hospital full of grown ups... I learned a lot in my week stay there. As for using my depression and suicide attempt as a way to get attention, me and my ex girlfriend where doing great ... My depression didn't arise because of her

WRITING.TITLE: I confess that life is a bitch
WRITING.TEXT: So where should I start? My life has taken a huge down fall in the past year. A year from. Today I was dating what I thought would be the love of life, although I'm just 18 i feel like she's the only girl who will ever have loved me... My life started spiraling out of control after February where I drank bleach until I passed out and realized that I had depression. Because of my suicide attempt and depression I missed a lot of school days and lost many friends including my bestfriend (let's name him narf) . Despite all of that I tried to keep my head high and try to overcome my depression. My ex girlfriend at the time was the only thing I had. As the year continued I felt that my depression was affecting her and I decided to break up with her, after that she was my best friend and my only friend she would come visit me on my down days and give me kisses... Fast forward to a few month ago she tells me she doesn't love me and has feelings for my bestfriend (narf). I feel betrayed, lonely and helpless. I really don't have any friends anymore. And when I try talking to someone they never reply to my messages.. She told me that doesn't see herself going out with me ever again.... It's hard to move on... The nightmares of them being together just haunt me. Valentines will suck and life is a bitch
Lol goodluck breaking even

WRITING.TITLE: How 2 seduce, while having depression

The issue started to arise when she mentioned she is in a long distance relationship with her boyfriend who she cares a lot about. I felt rejected. And have been really bummed out about it. I wish I could seduce her even though she has a boyfriend, but my depression literally brings my confidence down to zero. Since I feel rejected i have been feeling sad. I feel like it's a repeating cycle. Should I pursue or Learn great seducing tips?

WRITING.TITLE: Nursing feedback
WRITING.TEXT: Nursing questions? Ok so I'm 18 male and about to graduate high school, which I didn't do so hot at due to a 4 year struggle with depression and finding myself. Anyway I am planning to pursue a career in nursing and i was wondering where do I start. I'm planning to go to lone start for 2 years and transfer to a university. My question is what colleges in texas are the best for nursing? What colleges are realistically in my league to transfer to after lone star? ( I plan to keep a 4.0 gpa at lonestar... Im a smart kid I just had a lot of issues in my life throughout high-school) what are the pros and cons for a male nurse and salary wise for an rn in texas? And finally is it better to have a masters, bachelor's or associate degree in nursing? I know this a lot of questions, but the more feedback the better. I really want to help people out and make a nice living out of it :) and Ty for reading this
